title: Bloodsoaked Greataxe
content:
Bloodsoaked Greataxe Uncommon 2~13 Damage 1d12 +1 Slashing Weapon Enchantment +1 Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Droplets of blood bead the edge of this like rain on glass, yet they never drip, and touching them reveals them to be smooth, hard gemstones. Greataxe Two-Handed 3.15 130

Bloodsoaked Greataxe

1d12 +1 Slashing

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
